full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE'I SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR GYI CHO GA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(SMRAS PA, MTHU STOBS DBANG PHYUG GSANG BA'I BDAG PO YI, SGO NAS NAD GDON DGRA BGEGS BAR CHOD RNAMS, BZLOG CING BSGYUR BA'I CHO GA 'DI LTA BU'I, THU SHE YE GUNG KUN DGA' DON LDAN ZHES, ,BYA BA'I MNGA' 'BANGS DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BLO GROS DANG, ,DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BRTZON 'GRUS GNYIS KA NAN CHER GYIS, ,YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGOR BSRUNG DE'I SLAD DU, GZHAN GYI BZLOG BSGYUR CHO GAS RIGS 'GRE NAS, ,^BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN SUG BRIS LA, LHAG CHAD NOR 'KHRUL SOGS NYES PA CI MCHIS KUN, ,BLA MA LTA TSOGS BZOD CING BYAMS BAR MDZOD, ,GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA DES, ,RGYAL BA'I BSTAN DANG BSTAN 'DZIN DAR CING RGYAS, ,MA GYUR 'GRO KUN BAR CHOD KUN SEL ZHING, ,TSE RABS KUN TU BLA MA RJES BZUNG STE, ,KUN MKHYEN GO 'PHANG RGYU RU BSNGO, ,ZHES PA 'DI NI THU SHE YE KUNG KUN DGA' DON LDAN ZHES BGYI BA'I @008B 'BANGS, DGE SLONOG BLO BZANG BLO GROS DANG, PI LIG THU DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BRTZON 'GRUS GNYIS KA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG YANG NAN TAN CHEN OPR BSKUL BA'I NGOR BSRUNG BA'I CHED DU, BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE BSGOS BSAM GTAN RGYA MTSO'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
